Package org.zaproxy.zap.extension.authentication

Class ExtensionAuthentication

java.lang.Object
org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionAdaptor
org.zaproxy.zap.extension.authentication.ExtensionAuthentication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Extension, ContextDataFactory, ContextPanelFactory
public class ExtensionAuthentication extends ExtensionAdaptor implements ContextPanelFactory, ContextDataFactory
The Extension that handles Authentication methods, in correlation with Contexts.

      public boolean supportsDb(String type)
      Description copied from interface: Extension
      Return true if the specified db type is supported by the extension (or if it doesn't use any db) If this method returns false (meaning the db in use is not supported) then the extension will not be loaded.
      Specified by:

      Overrides:
      supportsDb in class ExtensionAdaptor
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the login request uri for context, or null, if the context does not have a 'login request' configured
